summary: Comprehensive testing completed for TechTribe premium digital agency website iteration 2. Backend maintained excellent performance (13/14 tests, 92.9% success). Frontend redesign with premium visual effects tested thoroughly - all major features working including gradient text, glass morphism, floating animations, navbar effects, and logo overlay transitions. Only minor chat widget toggle issue persists from iteration 1.

minor_issues.impact: Expected behavior - Claude Sonnet 4.5 responses can take time
minor_issues.note: This is normal for AI endpoints and not a critical issue

ui_bugs.issue: Chat toggle button clicks but window doesn't open
ui_bugs.note: Same issue from iteration 1 - overlay/z-index problem persists

design_feedback.feedback: Excellent execution of premium dark theme with gradient text effects, glass morphism cards, floating orbit animations, and professional Azerbaijani content throughout
Navbar glass effects work perfectly, logo overlay animation smooth, all page transitions working beautifully

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section and gradient text effects ('gələcəyinizi', 'paketlər', 'başlayaq')
Found 7 floating animation elements and 18 glass morphism cards working
All 6 homepage sections load: Hero, Why TechTribe, How We Work, What We Deliver, Tech Stack, Featured Products, CTA
Navigation works: Home, About, Catalogue, Contact, Auth links functional
Navbar glass effect activates on scroll with proper blur/transparency
Logo overlay animation works when clicking logo on non-home pages
Catalogue page loads with 7 products properly displayed
Category filters work (Hamısı, Biznes, E-Ticarət, Landing, Portfolio, Korporativ, Startup)
Search functionality works on catalogue page
Product detail page navigation and content loading works
Contact form submission works with success message display
Auth page login/register tabs work properly
Admin login successful with admin@techtribe.az / admin123
Admin panel fully functional: Dashboard, Products CRUD, Messages, Chat sections
Admin logout functionality works
Footer visible with social icons and contact info (info@techtribe.az)
Backend API: GET /api/catalogue returns 7 items
Backend API: POST /api/auth/login and register work
Backend API: POST /api/contact saves messages successfully
Backend API: GET /api/dashboard/stats returns proper stats
Backend API: Full CRUD operations work (create/update/delete products)
Premium dark theme with excellent contrast and professional spacing
All text content in Azerbaijani language
Mobile responsive design maintained
Tech marquee, bento grid stats, and dot pattern backgrounds working
Featured products section shows 3 cards with proper pricing (599, 399, 999 AZN)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (only chat widget toggle issue remains from iteration 1)

action_item_for_main_agent.chat_widget_fix: Chat widget toggle button clicks but doesn't open chat window. Same z-index/overlay issue from iteration 1 persists. Need to investigate ChatWidget.js component and ensure proper z-index stacking.
action_item_for_main_agent.specific_issue: Button click registered but chat window doesn't appear - likely z-index conflict
